item.title: Shareable Wishlists for Kids
item.description: Share kid wishlists with family & friends

item.title: Stability improvements, product search enhancements
item.description: - Search & browse products for kid shops - Create and add your own items to shops - Family PIN to securely switch between users - So many improvements to the app

item.title: Major Release
item.description: Added product search & browse, custom products, pin to switch between family members

item.title: Major App Improvements & Charitable Giving!
item.description: Ketshop now supports giving to charitable causes. UI improvements & bug fixes. Invite/share with a friend.

item.title: Major Release
item.description: Major improvements to user experience, collaborative shopping, and family money magement.

item.title: Ketshop Early Access
item.description: First early access release with basic functionality for beta testing.
